programme.title: Bill Clinton's clothes
programme.short_synopsis: Why do journalists flock to Washington for the presidential election?
programme.medium_synopsis: The tendency of journalists flock to Washington to hear the result of an election and the rejection of the blue blazer for jeans by President-elect, Bill Clinton.
